definition: to seek/to look for/to request/to demand/to beseech

sentences.english: But there is more to writing a good cover letter.
sentences.chinese: 但是想要寫出一封精彩的求職信遠沒有這麼簡單。

sentences.english: Acouple of months ago a friend asked if I'd write her a job reference.
sentences.chinese: 幾個月前，一位朋友問我是否能幫她寫封求職推薦信。

sentences.english: The unemployed engineer wrote a dozen applications for jobs but go nothing.
sentences.chinese: 失業的工程師一連寫了十幾封求職信，但一無所獲。

sentences.english: She wore her suit to the job interview.
sentences.chinese: 她穿上套裙去參加求職面試。

sentences.english: I tried WOC Radio in Davenport, Iowa.
sentences.chinese: 我試着到愛荷華州達文波特的woc電臺去求職。

sentences.english: Here's a look at 4 bone-headed moves job hunters commonly make.
sentences.chinese: 讓我們來看一看求職者通常會犯的4種低級錯誤。

sentences.english: The best jobseekers are and don't wait.
sentences.chinese: 最好的求職者從來不坐等其成，而是主動出擊。

sentences.english: The digital world has blown the doors off traditional job-search methods.
sentences.chinese: 數字世界顛覆了傳統的求職方法。

sentences.english: Assistant to manager of accounting department of a joint venture enterprise.
sentences.chinese: 一家合資企業會計北京電焊工求職經理的助理。

sentences.english: Thank you for taking the time in his busy schedule to read my job materials.
sentences.chinese: 感謝您在百忙之中抽出時間來閱讀我的求職材料。

sentences.english: The anxiety of non-key college students is more remarkable than the key colleges'.
sentences.chinese: 大學生是否擔任過學生幹部在求職焦慮上存在差異。

sentences.english: May I submit a cover letter, addressed to a specific individual, with my resume?
sentences.chinese: 我可以將我的求職信和簡歷一起發給一個指定的人嗎？

sentences.english: The cover letter is often neglected or concocted out of standard phrases.
sentences.chinese: 求職信京常被忽視，或者由一些標準片段組成。

sentences.english: It said the vocational training plan should be implemented sooner and enterprises should be encouraged to offer skill training for its employees.
sentences.chinese: 評論說，職業培訓應進早引進給求職者提供技能培訓。

sentences.english: We say we want to besuccessful but we sabotage the job interview.
sentences.chinese: 我們說想要職業成功，卻在求職面試時故意搞砸。

sentences.english: Some say physical appearance matters even more to employers than a cover letter.
sentences.chinese: 有些研究稱相貌對僱主來說甚至比求職信還重要。

definition: to be employed/to be in post/on-the-job
every trade/all professions/all walks of life
to enter oneself for an examination
workplace/workforce (of a nation or industry etc)/job market
to enter the next grade school
abbr. for 外籍勞工|外籍劳工[wai4 ji2 lao2 gong1]/foreign worker
to accept a job offer/to apply for an advertised position
